segments.text: Are you the loan officer of this bank ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I certainly am . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was wondering if I could ask you some questions about a loan I want to make .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . By all means please do . Please take a seat .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you . See , I ’ m planning to buy a car here and I ’ m planning to use my time deposit here as the collateral .
segments.speaker: S1
